title: What mystery skin did you get? :D
body: Hey all! Just got my mystery skin gift from Riot after getting out of an aram match.  I ended up with final boss veigar! :D Thank you so much riot, I appreciate the gift and I hope you keep on doing what you're doing to make this game so darn enjoyable.

replies.body: I got Corporate Mundo.  Isn't it a legendary skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Saint Latona,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TIsuWLPW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-09T03:49:41.521+0000)
>
> I got Corporate Mundo.  Isn't it a legendary skin?

yep congrats

haven't gotten mine yet, never been banned , so much as chat restricted , only couple of leaves I might have are dcs or power outages, but if I can connect back up ill always do it asap...I hope this doesn't mean I don't get a skin
btw, how did you get it, u get an ingame message ?  email?  just appeared on your collection?
Haven't gotten mine yet but I'm pretty sure it will be like every other gift where next time you're not in a game a screen will pop up showing you what gift you received
It's just slow for some people, myself included. Don't worry about it, it'll come in the next day or so.
Yeah I also have not got one, I think it is just because well there are like a crap ton of players. hopefully we all will get ours tomorrow.
http://i.imgur.com/INAy05L.jpg
Still got nothing:'(
Same here...but that's to be expected with me...I always have bad luck >.>
OMG Finally:') Got Boom Boom Blizcrank
Finally did, but I think Riot thinks torturing me is funny...I got Battle bunny Riven
just got wicked lulu {{champion:117}}
Riot gave me Riot {{champion:53}}. Never going to forget which one I got from them now!
Got Guardian of the Sands Kha'Zix. Already have Mecha so not too excited but thanks a bunch anyways Riot

Lollipoppy
Now I need to play Poppy...
hmmm i have been banned, chat restricted and i even got perma banned and somehow came back, i got reverse annie skin, go figure.
I got caterpillar kog'maw :)
Underworld TF... I've wanted this skin forever! Ty Rito
I got Woad Scout Quinn much love for u riot!
Never been banned or chat restricted, so I assume that it is just taking a while to give everybody their gift.
Loch Ness Cho'gath :) thank you Riot!

> [{quoted}](name=playdohboy,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TIsuWLPW,comment-id=0029,timestamp=2015-01-09T14:29:59.743+0000)
>
> I GOT BAD SANTA VEIGAR!!! It was like a late christmas :)

Got Nutcracko, same boat. Still awesome!

Nothing yet and I'm sad. :c

I've never gotten a chat restriction or any ranked/normal game bans, or bans in general.. but alas no skin
I haven't gotten mine either, but I meet the requirements so don't worry yet.

I won't get one. T-T
Game crashed my laptop one day and my computer locked it out for a full week (Took me that long to figure out how to unlock it) resulting in a level restriction. After that I may have been reported for Feeding Lux one game when I was first using Riven and playing her Like Ahri. (Really bad idea) After that, I've been nice to everyone joking  all the time and all that mombo jombo :3 
I've not played out side of bots really since I know I'm not that smart or good with anyone XD
did you get banned from chat or something? If you only did these things you should get the gifts. They only started handing them out yesterday.

I got level restrected because the Game failed to work properly twice when needed with in an hour or so. The first time the game just Exited while still being open in the menu resulting in a thirty minute penalty of no playing. Shortly there after is when the game crashed my laptop and was locked out resutling in me getting a level restriction which from my understanding ends the ability to get the item.
You were put in a low priority qeue because of the leaves, but that doesn't take your gift away. They aimed this gifting to players who aren't negative in chat.
OOOOoh okay ^^ Woot :D
Me? learn something!? Are You crazy :D
Augmented Singed
Have all of the mystery skins been sent? I've never been restricted or anything and haven't gotten one that I know of unless it didn't popup since my client crashed when I opened

I would have been fine with any skin, but I was secretly hoping for one of a few....and I got one on my list :D

Special Forces Gangplank! Yay :D Thanks Riot!
noiiiiiiice also go sf gp from a mystery gift back during halloween!
nothing yet
Forecast Janna! I love Janna and didn't have a skin for her, so this is great.
High Noon Twisted Fate
I haven't gotten anything. Now I'm sad because I'm afraid I won't get a gift. :/

I got snowmerdinger or however you spell it.

I guess its time to take up maining heimer like I planned..


No srsly tho, thanks Riot, Mystery skins always get me learning new champs better.
Battlecast Kog Maw
Sun Goddess Karma... better than nothing, thanks Riot! :)
head huntah mastah yi ftw
ooooh i aint logged in a couple days i am supper cited to see what i getzded{{summoner:4}}

bladecraft orianna
thanx riot! 

looks great, don't like orianna much but might play her more now

if those mana regen nerfs could be worked on thatd be great  :D
